name: part_002
file: tmp_【#バカタレ２周年記念LIVE】音楽ライブ♬　BAKATARATION PARTY【ホロライブ⧸白上フブキ⧸不知火フレア⧸角巻わため】 [hQB206l932M]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: MC section with Fubuki, Flare, and Watame riding horses on stage.
Performance of 'Positive Dance Time' by Fubuki and Flare.

subtitles.original: あの、オープニングとかに馬が出てたので、ちょっと馬を用意していただきました！
subtitles.english: Since horses appeared in the opening, we had them prepare some for us!

subtitles.original: ありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: Thank you very much!

subtitles.original: 嬉しい、乗れて嬉しい。
subtitles.english: I'm so happy I got to ride one.

subtitles.original: ね、乗れてよかったね。降りることもできるけど、一切降りなかったね、二人とも。
subtitles.english: Right, I'm glad. You can get off, but neither of you did at all.

subtitles.original: かわいいから乗ってた。
subtitles.english: We stayed on because they're cute.

subtitles.original: ずっと乗ったままやんけと思って。
subtitles.english: I was thinking, "You're just staying on them."

subtitles.original: え、このMCずっとこのままですか？
subtitles.english: Wait, are we staying like this for the whole MC?

subtitles.original: 降りる？でもまだ始まったばっかりで、他にも何回も、やるよね、MCね。
subtitles.english: Should we get off? But it just started, and we'll have more MC segments, right?

subtitles.original: 確かに。おしゃべりしてると思うから、まあ最初は...
subtitles.english: True. Since we'll just be chatting, for the start...

subtitles.original: 最初はのんびりと...
subtitles.english: Let's take it easy at first...

subtitles.original: 是非この辺にテロップで、私たち名前のせといてください。
subtitles.english: Please put our names in the captions around here.

subtitles.original: ああ、やっぱりね。誰々です、誰々です、誰々です。
subtitles.english: Ah, right. "I'm so-and-so," "I'm so-and-so," "I'm so-and-so."

subtitles.original: そうそうそう、お願いします。
subtitles.english: Yes, yes, yes. Please do.

subtitles.original: この後もね、確かにMCもありますし、曲もね...
subtitles.english: After this, we'll have more MC segments and songs...

subtitles.original: いっぱい歌っていこうと思いますので、今日はよろしくお願いいたします！
subtitles.english: We're going to sing lots of songs, so please enjoy the show today!

subtitles.original: いっぱい盛り上がりましょう！
subtitles.english: Let's get hyped!

subtitles.original: わため、馬がちょっと歩いてるけど大丈夫か？
subtitles.english: Watame, the horse is walking a bit, are you okay?

subtitles.original: 帰りたいんか、もしや。
subtitles.english: Does it want to go home, maybe?

subtitles.original: ダメダメ。帰りたいみたい。帰ろうとしてる。
subtitles.english: No, no. It seems it wants to go home. It's trying to go back.

subtitles.original: じゃあ、次の曲の準備をしに、じゃあ行きますか！
subtitles.english: Then, shall we go get ready for the next song?

subtitles.original: はーい！じゃあ次の曲もお楽しみに！
subtitles.english: Okay! Look forward to the next song!

subtitles.original: よいしょー！
subtitles.english: Heave-ho!

subtitles.original: 馬なのに... そっちにこっちくんか...
subtitles.english: Even though it's a horse... It's coming this way...

subtitles.original: いくよ！
subtitles.english: Here we go!

subtitles.original: マミムメモヤモヤな君も Are you ready? 準備はいい？
subtitles.english: Ma-Mi-Mu-Me-Moya-moya you too, are you ready? Are you prepared?

subtitles.original: ステップアップで 1 2 3 はい！ ポジティブ☆ダンスタイム
subtitles.english: Step up, 1, 2, 3, yes! Positive Dance Time

subtitles.original: 夢色を奏でるよ 空で Shall we dance?
subtitles.english: Playing dream-colors in the sky, shall we dance?

subtitles.original: 明日に笑われるくらい
subtitles.english: Enough to be laughed at by tomorrow

subtitles.original: しかめ面 お月様も 一緒に Shall we dance?
subtitles.english: Grimacing Mr. Moon, join us, shall we dance?

subtitles.original: 最高の気分で
subtitles.english: In the best of moods

subtitles.original: 1 2 3 のリズムで
subtitles.english: With the 1, 2, 3 rhythm

subtitles.original: 1 2 3 魔法をかけて
subtitles.english: 1, 2, 3, casting a spell

subtitles.original: 君だけのステップだから 世界がほら輝くの
subtitles.english: Because it's your own step, look, the world shines

subtitles.original: Wake up! Wake up! 遅れないでよ 魅惑のダンスタイム
subtitles.english: Wake up! Wake up! Don't be late, the captivating dance time

subtitles.original: Jumping! Jumping! 恥ずかしがらずに ハイ！ハイ！ハイハイハイハイ！
subtitles.english: Jumping! Jumping! Without being shy, high! high! high high high high!

subtitles.original: ダシダシタイ！ ダシダシタイ！ パピプペ ポジティブダンスタイム
subtitles.english: Want to let it out! Want to let it out! Pa-Pi-Pu-Pe Positive Dance Time

subtitles.original: 嫌なことも ダメダメダメ！ 君と一緒に踊れば
subtitles.english: Bad things are no good, no good, no good! If I dance with you

subtitles.original: ダシダシタイ！ ダシダシタイ！ 今はぎこちないリズムでも
subtitles.english: Want to let it out! Want to let it out! Even if the rhythm is awkward right now

subtitles.original: 青空に Let's be ambitious! きっと輝くから
subtitles.english: To the blue sky, let's be ambitious! It will surely shine

subtitles.original: マミムメモのりのりな君も Are you ready? 準備はいい？
subtitles.english: Ma-Mi-Mu-Me-Nori-nori you too, are you ready? Are you prepared?

subtitles.original: ステップアップで 1 2 3 はい！ ポジティブ☆ダンスタイム
subtitles.english: Step up, 1, 2, 3, yes! Positive Dance Time

subtitles.original: 雲色を奏でるよ 空で Shall we dance?
subtitles.english: Playing cloud-colors in the sky, shall we dance?

subtitles.original: 昨日を笑い飛ばすくらい
subtitles.english: Enough to laugh off yesterday

subtitles.original: 泣き虫な お星様も 一緒に Shall we dance?
subtitles.english: Crybaby stars, join us, shall we dance?

subtitles.original: 笑顔にしちゃおうよ
subtitles.english: Let's make them smile

subtitles.original: 1 2 3 のリズムで
subtitles.english: With the 1, 2, 3 rhythm

subtitles.original: 1 2 3 魔法をかけて
subtitles.english: 1, 2, 3, casting a spell

subtitles.original: 君だけのステップだから 世界がほら輝いた
subtitles.english: Because it's your own step, look, the world has shone

subtitles.original: Wake up! Wake up! 止まらないでよ 素敵なダンスタイム
subtitles.english: Wake up! Wake up! Don't stop, the wonderful dance time

subtitles.original: Jumping! Jumping! 無我夢中で ほら ハイ！ハイ！ハイイェー！
subtitles.english: Jumping! Jumping! In a trance, look, high! high! high yeah!

subtitles.original: ダシダシタイ！ ダシダシタイ！ パピプペ ポジティブダンスタイム
subtitles.english: Want to let it out! Want to let it out! Pa-Pi-Pu-Pe Positive Dance Time

subtitles.original: 前を向いて Let's! Let's! Let's! 君と一緒に奏でよう
subtitles.english: Look forward, let's! let's! let's! Let's play together with you

subtitles.original: ダシダシタイ！ ダシダシタイ！ 今は慣れないメロディでも
subtitles.english: Want to let it out! Want to let it out! Even if the melody is unfamiliar right now

subtitles.original: 夢色に Let's be ambitious! きっと届くから
subtitles.english: In dream-colors, let's be ambitious! It will surely reach

subtitles.original: 準備はいいかー！
subtitles.english: Are you ready?!

subtitles.original: Wake up! Wake up! 遅れないでよ 超最高のダンスタイム
subtitles.english: Wake up! Wake up! Don't be late, the super-best dance time

subtitles.original: Jumping! Jumping! 思いのまま ほら ハイ！ハイ！ハイハイハイハイ！
subtitles.english: Jumping! Jumping! As you wish, look, high! high! high high high high!

subtitles.original: 宝素晴らしい！ ダシダシタイ！ ダシダシタイ！ パピプペ ポジティブダンスタイム
subtitles.english: Treasure-wonderful! Want to let it out! Want to let it out! Pa-Pi-Pu-Pe Positive Dance Time

subtitles.original: 涙拭いて Let's! Let's! Let's! 君と一緒に踊れば
subtitles.english: Wipe your tears, let's! let's! let's! If I dance with you

subtitles.original: ダシダシタイ！ ダシダシタイ！ 今は真っ白なキャンバスも
subtitles.english: Want to let it out! Want to let it out! Even if the canvas is blank right now

subtitles.original: 君色に Let's be ambitious! 描けるの
subtitles.english: In your color, let's be ambitious! You can paint it

subtitles.original: もう一回！ ポジティブダンスタイム
subtitles.english: One more time! Positive Dance Time

subtitles.original: ダシダシタイ！ ダシダシタイ！ パピプペ ポジティブダンスタイム
subtitles.english: Want to let it out! Want to let it out! Pa-Pi-Pu-Pe Positive Dance Time

subtitles.original: みんなで派手 Let's! Let's! Let's! 楽しい楽しい優勝だね
subtitles.english: Everyone flashy, let's! let's! let's! It's fun, fun victory

subtitles.original: 虹色の毎日を ずっとずっと 笑い疲れるくらい
subtitles.english: Rainbow-colored every day, always and forever, enough to get tired of laughing

subtitles.original: 踊ってたい Let's be ambitious! でも今日はおやすみ
subtitles.english: I want to keep dancing, let's be ambitious! But for today, good night

subtitles.original: マミムメモヤモヤな君も...
subtitles.english: Ma-Mi-Mu-Me-Moya-moya you too...
